column1: 500Qk00000KiLmfIAF,"00432514","Support Ticket","SVC Account Password Change","Hello there. We have a password change coming up for the service account being used for Stealth Enterprise. I am wondering if there is anywhere within the console or activity monitor that the password needs to be changed. If there is any documentation that would be helpful as well. Thank you.","","The customer has planned to update the service account password and wants to know where to change it when updating.","","Here are a few places you need to keep in mind when updating your password:
Other Places (less likely to be used)
Select the agent and click on Edit. Under the connection tab, update the password if a specific account was used.

Select the Host and click Edit. Under the Auditing tab, update the user's password to connect to the OneFS Platform API.","Guidance","Frantz Baptiste","Question","Netwrix Enterprise Auditor","StealthAUDIT General","Credentials","11.5","","5.1","Closed - Resolved","American Express","Alex Parsa","2025-01-16T18:31:33.000Z","2025-01-21T21:53:02.000Z"
